titleInfo.title: Hill Memorial Library exterior view of west side, with snow

mods.abstract: The Hill Memorial Library was donated to the University by Mr. John Hill of West Baton Rouge, as a memorial to his son, John Hill Jr.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
